original_text: In some of the cities Jesus had done many powerful things. But some people in those cities did not want to stop doing wrong things. They did not want to change how they lived. So Jesus spoke against those people.
korean_text: 예수께서 권능을 가장 많이 행하신 고을들이 회개하지 아니하므로 그 때에 책망하시되

sentences.original_text: Jesus had done many powerful things
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 많은 능력 있는 일들을 행하셨다

sentences.original_text: But some people in those cities
did not want to stop doing wrong things
They did not want to change how they lived
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들이 사는 방식을 바꾸고 싶어하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: So Jesus spoke against those people
